name: Brian Chesky
title: Co-founder & CEO
bio: Brian Chesky co-founded Airbnb and has led it from a simple idea of air mattresses in a living room to a global hospitality company. He's known for his design-driven approach to building products and his focus on creating experiences people love.

name: Claire Hughes Johnson
title: Corporate Officer & Advisor
bio: Claire Hughes Johnson spent over a decade at Google before joining Stripe as COO. She's the author of 'Scaling People' and is known for her expertise in building and scaling high-performing organizations.

name: Keith Rabois
title: General Partner
bio: Keith Rabois is a legendary Silicon Valley operator and investor. He was an early executive at PayPal, LinkedIn, and Square, and is known for his frameworks on building companies that ship fast.
